title: Homeopathy
description: Also known as Complementary Medicine/Therapies, Medical Herbs. Homeopathy aims to stimulate the body's own powers of healing. Contact your local Nuffield Health for more information.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy - Overview Or call us on Homeopathy, also known as 'complementary medicine/therapy', uses the preparations of substances, often in very small amounts, to trigger the body's own powers of healing. How homeopathy works Based on the concept of, "like cures like", a substance used to promote healing in a sick person, would produce a similar clinical picture if given to a healthy person, or rather as a tiny amount of inactivated virus is used in vaccinations to promote immunity against that infection.
